items.sentence: Tom is a pretty good fellow when you get to know him.
I'd like to go and see Tom, but what good will it do?
It's hard for an old man to change his way of living.
Why don't you take your time in finishing your paper?
It's not as if just anybody can write a literary gem.
I found my father's diary which he kept for 30 years.
The weatherman says we'll have rain in the afternoon.
Tom said he hopes that Mary won't do that by herself.
Have you already spent all the money that I gave you?
Tom has been spending money like there's no tomorrow.
